titles.title: Emergency Prison Construction Funding Act of 1987
A bill to authorize the expenditure of funds not needed for purposes of the Department of Justice Assets Forfeiture Fund and the Customs Forfeiture Fund for purposes of emergency prison construction.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

term.name: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

bill.summary: 4/10/1987--Introduced. Emergency Prison Construction Funding Act of 1987 - Authorizes the expenditure of funds not needed for the purposes of the Department of Justice Assets Forfeiture Fund and the Customs Forfeiture Fund for: (1) emergency prison construction; and (2) grants for drug law enforcement programs.
